parameter.name: MyConnectionString-Web.config Connection String
parameter.description: MyConnectionString Connection String used in web.config by the application to access the database.

parameter.name: PivProdReader-Web.config Connection String
parameter.description: PivProdReader Connection String used in web.config by the application to access the database.
parameter.defaultvalue: Data Source=SVRSQLPROD;Initial Catalog=MASTER_ED; User Id=webappuser; Password=aaawny

parameter.name: conERSDW-Web.config Connection String
parameter.description: conERSDW Connection String used in web.config by the application to access the database.
parameter.defaultvalue: Data Source=SVRDWDB;Initial Catalog=ApplicationData; User Id=webappuser; Password=aaawny

parameter.name: connDM-Web.config Connection String
parameter.description: connDM Connection String used in web.config by the application to access the database.
parameter.defaultvalue: Data Source=SVRDWDB;Initial Catalog=DimensionMaster; User Id=webappuser; Password=aaawny
